title: 服务器不能使用打火石
author: SJR丶子封
txt_content:
各位大佬
服务器空岛玩家无法使用打火石
怎么办？

replies.author: kelord
replies.txt_content:
ESS插件config文件找到：

protect:
  # General physics/behavior modifications.
  prevent:
    lava-flow: false
    water-flow: false
    water-bucket-flow: false
    fire-spread: true
    lava-fire-spread: true
    flint-fire: false
最后这项改成false

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 空岛打火石教程>点击传送

replies.author: SJR丶子封
replies.txt_content:
PY狗 发表于 2019-4-16 08:39
空岛打火石教程>点击传送
都改了，还是没用

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 输入重置指令/asadmin settingsreset all

replies.author: SJR丶子封
replies.txt_content:
PY狗 发表于 2019-4-16 09:08
输入重置指令/asadmin settingsreset all
重置了也没用

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 服务器装了哪些插件，截图一下

replies.author: Back_Wheel
replies.txt_content: 请将你的askyblock插件的配置文件中的fire项目改为true
